Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand vs Australia T20I series – All you need to know
New Zealand will host Australia in a three-match T20I series starting Wednesday as the teams continue their preparation for the upcoming T20 World Cup.
The Kiwis have historically been dominated by the Aussies at home and overall in T20Is.
